pr_title: fixed support for current java Versions in templates

timeline.message:
fixed support for current java Versions is templates

Fixes #3798 by replacing the bndtools specic JavaLevel Enum with the
usage of the EE enum

Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert <j.albert@data-in-motion.biz>

timeline.author: bjhargrave
